LanguageData.LockableDoorsAllowColonistsTooltip: Allow player controlled pawns and mech through this locked door.
LanguageData.LockableDoorsAllowMechsTooltip: Allow colony mechs through this locked door.
LanguageData.LockableDoorsAllowPetsTooltip: Allow player owned animals through this locked door.
LanguageData.LockableDoorsAllowAlliesTooltip: Allow pawns from non-hostile factions through this locked door.
LanguageData.LockableDoorsAllowSlavesTooltip: Allow colony slaves through this locked door.
